title: innum En varavillai
sahitya:
innum En varavillai enru teriyavillaiyE endanadu kAdalan kanda nAthan sakhiyE


anupallavi

  inru vandiDuvadAga endaniDam Anai pala iTTu ennait-tETri viTTu viDai peTravan


caraNam 1    punnakai merugu pUsi anravan pEshinadai peNmaip-pEdamaiyAl uNmai enreNNinEn
enna viLaiyum pinnE enbadindu arindEn ennidayam puNpaTTu EmAndu pOi viTTEn
    caraNam 2    endan Aviyak-koLLai iTTup-pOnavan EnO inda uDalai ivvidam nondu naliya viTTAnaDi
cintaiyaik-kallaippOl sheidu koNDu viTTAnO enda vidamAgattAn inda vEdanai sahippEnO
